subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The sophomore reserve Vernon Macklin scored a career-high 18 points and No. 6 Georgetown handed St. John’s its worst Big East loss, 74-42, on Wednesday night at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: The sophomore reserve Vernon Macklin scored a career-high 18 points and No. 6 Georgetown handed St. John’s its worst Big East loss, 74-42, on Wednesday night at Madison Square Garden.
